title: Legal Counsel
content:
OVERVIEW:Are you our next Legal Counsel? We‚Äôre looking for someone to join our Legal team, to help provide timely, pragmatic & commercially focused legal advice and support to all business functions to mitigate risk across the group and protect Gymshark‚Äôs interests & assets.  The role will have a commercial focus with some support across IP, brand protection and privacy.
We ideally are looking for an individual who is 1 - 4 years PQE who wants to develop their in-house experience. 
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

Drafting and negotiating a wide range of contracts including influencer and athlete agreements, tech/SaaS agreements, consultancy agreements, recruitment terms and global consumer and B2B terms
Providing advice on a range of commercial matters affecting all business functions
Participation in the deployment of practical elements of the Legal Strategy taking ownership for specific legal projects
Assisting with horizon scanning and implementing an internal legal training programme
Designing and delivering training across the business relating to the above areas
The development of collaborative relationships with all Gymshark business functions
Driving knowledge sharing and good practice across all internal stakeholder groups
Keeping up to date with legal developments as part of your CPD

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:Essential Criteria:

Qualified as a solicitor in England & Wales
Experience in commercial or contract law gained in Private Practice or In House
Excellent written & verbal communication skills
High degree of professional ethics, integrity & gravitas
Organisational skills
Outstanding attention to detail
Stakeholder management experience (ability to build trust and rapport)
Proactive and able to use initiative
Honest and reliable
Willingness and ability to give and receive effective feedback, challenge and be challenged
Commercial awareness

WHAT YOU COULD ALSO HAVE:

B2C Consumer experience
Retail exposure

This is a hybrid role and would require the successful candidate to attend at least 3 days a week in GSHQ, Solihull, UK.
CLOSING DATE: Thursday 30th November 2023.
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com. 
ABOUT US.
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
